00010 #include <stdio.h>
00011 #include <stdlib.h>

00018 double*** alloc3d(int NZED, int NY, int NX)
00019 {
00020   int iy, iz;
00021 
00022   double ***arr3d = (double ***) malloc(NZED * sizeof(double **));
00023   if (arr3d == NULL)
00024     return NULL;
00025 
00026   for (iz = 0; iz < NZED; iz++) {
00027     arr3d[iz] = (double **) malloc(NY * sizeof(double *));
00028     if (arr3d[iz] == NULL)
00029       return NULL;
00030   }
00031   
00032   arr3d[0][0] = (double *) malloc(NZED * NY * NX * sizeof(double));
00033   if (arr3d[0][0] == NULL)
00034     return NULL;
00035   
00036   for (iy = 1; iy < NY; iy++)
00037     arr3d[0][iy] = arr3d[0][0] + iy * NX;
00038   
00039   for (iz = 1; iz < NZED; iz++)
00040     for (iy = 0; iy < NY; iy++)
00041       arr3d[iz][iy] = arr3d[0][0] + (iz * NY + iy) * NX;
00042 
00043   return arr3d;
00044 }
00045 
00046 float*** alloc3d_f(int NZED, int NY, int NX)
00047 {
00048   int iy, iz;
00049 
00050   float ***arr3d = (float ***) malloc(NZED * sizeof(float **));
00051   if (arr3d == NULL)
00052     return NULL;
00053 
00054   for (iz = 0; iz < NZED; iz++) {
00055     arr3d[iz] = (float **) malloc(NY * sizeof(float *));
00056     if (arr3d[iz] == NULL)
00057       return NULL;
00058   }
00059   
00060   arr3d[0][0] = (float *) malloc(NZED * NY * NX * sizeof(float));
00061   if (arr3d[0][0] == NULL)
00062     return NULL;
00063   
00064   for (iy = 1; iy < NY; iy++)
00065     arr3d[0][iy] = arr3d[0][0] + iy * NX;
00066   
00067   for (iz = 1; iz < NZED; iz++)
00068     for (iy = 0; iy < NY; iy++)
00069       arr3d[iz][iy] = arr3d[0][0] + (iz * NY + iy) * NX;
00070 
00071   return arr3d;
00072 }
00073 
00074 void free3d(double*** arr3d, int NZED)
00075 {
00076     int iz;
00077     free(arr3d[0][0]);
00078     arr3d[0][0] = NULL;
00079     for (iz = 0; iz < NZED; iz++) {
00080         free(arr3d[iz]);
00081         arr3d[iz] = NULL;
00082     }
00083     free(arr3d);
00084     arr3d = NULL;
00085 }
00086 
00087 void free3d_f(float*** arr3d, int NZED)
00088 {
00089     int iz;
00090     free(arr3d[0][0]);
00091     arr3d[0][0] = NULL;
00092     for (iz = 0; iz < NZED; iz++) {
00093         free(arr3d[iz]);
00094         arr3d[iz] = NULL;
00095     }
00096     free(arr3d);
00097     arr3d = NULL;
00098 }

00104 
00105 float** alloc2d_f(int NY, int NX)
00106 {
00107   int iy;
00108 
00109   float **arr2d = (float **) malloc(NY * sizeof(float *));
00110   if (arr2d == NULL)
00111     return NULL;
00112 
00113   /* allocate the memory for the array */
00114   arr2d[0] = (float *) malloc(NY * NX * sizeof(float));
00115   if (arr2d[0] == NULL)
00116     return NULL;
00117 
00118   /* assign pointers to rows */
00119   for (iy = 1; iy < NY; iy++)
00120     arr2d[iy] = arr2d[0] + iy * NX;
00121 
00122   return arr2d;
00123 }
00124 
00125 void free2d_f(float** arr2d, int NY)
00126 {
00127   free(arr2d[0]);
00128   arr2d[0] = NULL;
00129 
00130   free(arr2d);
00131   arr2d = NULL;
00132 }
